channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell Command Configure (DCC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell Command Configure (DCC)

item.title: CVE-2022-34457|2024-08-03T09:15:15.293Z -- dell -- dell%20command%20configure%20%28dcc%29
item.description: Dell command configuration, version 4.8 and prior, contains improper folder permission when installed not to default path but to non-secured path which leads to privilege escalation. This is critical severity vulnerability as it allows non-admin to modify the files inside installed directory and able to make application unavailable for all users.
